nodes.text: The fell swoop formation was a flight maneuver used by TIE fighter pilots of the Galactic Empire. Around 3 ABY, the elite pilots of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing used the formation when Squadron Five were ambushed by the thought-to-be-disabled Star Destroyer Celerity in the Kudo system.
Sometime during the Galactic Civil War, Titan Squadron notably used this formation during an engagement against the New Republic's Vanguard Squadron.

The fell swoop formation was first mentioned in the comic TIE Fighter 2, published on May 15, 2019. The name made another appearance by a player controlled character's computer-generated voice in the multiplayer portion of the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
